alert.note: Alert for Madison (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 14 at 3:10PM EST until December 17 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THURSDAY TO 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 13 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Madison county. * WHEN...From 10 AM Thursday to 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be heavy and wet which could bring down branches. Power outages are possible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
